issue.title: How to run gazebo integrated unit test

content.raw:
@scpeters can you confirm that the ServerFixture and the other testing tools are included in `${GAZEBO_LIBRARIES}`? I'm trying to use ServerFixture and I can find the header, but I get a bunch of `undefined reference to gazebo::ServerFixture` when compiling.

Edit: I found [this issue](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/handsim/issues/80/building-serverfixture-outside-of-gazebo), maybe they are related?
content.html:
@scpeters can you confirm that the ServerFixture and the other testing tools are included in ${GAZEBO_LIBRARIES}? I'm trying to use ServerFixture and I can find the header, but I get a bunch of undefined reference to gazebo::ServerFixture when compiling.

Edit: I found this issue, maybe they are related?
